name: Quest for Camelot
description: Quest for Camelot is an action-adventure video game developed and published by Titus Software for the Game Boy Color in 1998. It is based on the animated Warner Bros. movie of the same name. The game is compatible with the Super Game Boy, Game Boy Printer and as well as play on the original Game Boy. A Nintendo 64 version of the game was planned but was scrapped due to the film's performance at the box office.
